item_blurb: Public comments will be heard at 9:00 am for items not on the agenda, for no more than 30 minutes. At the discretion of the Chair, speakers will be given up to 3 minutes. subitem_title: Executive Director's Report
Commission Correspondence

subitem_title: Legislative Report
subitem_blurb: Discussion and possible action on coastal-related legislation. (JA/SC-SF)

subitem_title: Changes to Commission Regulations
subitem_blurb: Discussion and possible Commission action on potential adoption of draft amendments to be submitted to Office of Administrative Law. The proposed changes would generally update Commission regulations to provide for electronic noticing, align provisions to current law, and make the regulations easier to use and understand. (RM-SF)

(CH-SD)

(SL-SD)

subitem_blurb: Application of George Gallian to remove existing 30’ x 6’ wide public access pier platform on four, 14-in. square concrete guide piles and expand existing shared use private dock system. The expansion of existing 30’ x 6’(180 sq.ft.) shared use private dock system consists of installing two, 14-in. square concrete marina guide piles; 38’ x 4’ finger; 14.5-ft. long x 4-ft. wide headwalk; 3’ x 3’ knee; and 18’ x 3’ knee, totaling 332 sq. feet. The existing gangway will be re-used, as well as, two, 14-in. square concrete marina guide piles. Post project the shared private dock will consist of 512 sq. feet, at 2806 Lafayette Ave., Newport Beach, Orange County. (FSY-LB)
